headline: Show HN: Use any web SaaS in an infinite canvas
description: I had this idea to embed browser in a canvas, so that u can use web saas like Notion and Airtable in an infinite canvas like Miro. Just finished a mvp for demo, check this: https://twitter.com/superusapp/status/1537644997725474816 Would love to know what u all think of it?
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 在一个无限的画布中使用任何网络SaaS
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 在一個無限的畫布中使用任何網絡SaaS
